title: Cortes on converting the Mexica - effect

content.prompt: Which of the following was a primary feature of social relations established in the Spanish colonies in the Western Hemisphere?

choices.label: The development of a rigid racial hierarchy
The growth of friendship and cooperation with native peoples
The emergence of racially mixed populations mingling European settlers, Native Americans, and Africans
A close-knit, homogeneous society with a thriving mixed economy of agriculture and commerce based on export crops

topic.text: 1.5: Labor, Slavery, and Caste in the Spanish Colonial System

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
